text: This transmits obsolete IRM 10.2.3 Safeguard Reviews.

Safeguard Reviews are no longer part of the FMSS Security Policy Office. As a result, this IRM is now obsolete, effective immediately. Guidance for the physical security review portion of the Safeguard Review is found in Publication 1075, Tax Information Security Guidelines for Federal, State and Local Agencies under the authority of Privacy, Government Liaison and Disclosure

State and Local Agencies under the authority of Privacy, Government Liaison and Disclosure Contractor Security Reviews are under the authority of Information Technology (IT) Cybersecurity. Guidance for this program is found in Publication
, Contractor Security Controls and IRM Information Technology, Policy and Guidance. Procurement provides additional guidance in their Policy and Procedure (P&P)
(J). Any IRM section that addresses safeguard reviews or references IRM

Contractor Security Reviews are under the authority of Information Technology (IT) Cybersecurity. Guidance for this program is found in Publication 4812, Contractor Security Controls and IRM 10.8.1, Information Technology, Policy and Guidance. Procurement provides additional guidance in their Policy and Procedure (P&P) 39.1(J).
